definition: to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House

sentences.english: Pakistan"s Chief of Army Staff Gen Ashfaq Parvez Kayani was also present during the ceremony."
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦陸軍總參謀長也出席了授獎儀式。

sentences.english: He also met with Pakistan's army chief, General Ashfaq Kayani.
sentences.chinese: 他還同巴基斯坦軍隊總參謀長卡亞尼將軍舉行了會晤。

sentences.english: Chief of the General Staff Chen Bingde held talks with him.
sentences.chinese: 陳炳德總參謀長與他舉行了會談。

definition: Japanese Kwantung army (or Kantō army), notorious for numerous atrocities in China during WWII
Autumn Harvest Uprising (1927), insurrection in Hunan and Jiangxi provinces led by Mao Zedong
the Kempeitai or Japanese Military Police 1881-1945 (Japanese counterpart of the Gestapo during WWII)
Chen Jiongming (1878-1933), a leading warlord of Guangdong faction, defeated in 1925 and fled to Hong Kong
United Front (either of the two alliances between the Guomindang and the Communist Party, 1923-1927 and 1937-1945)
mutiny/(Tw) to be dumped by one's girlfriend while serving in the army
Zhang Guotao (1897-1979), Chinese communist leader in the 1920s and 1930s, defected to Guomindang in 1938
Hundred Days Reform (1898), failed attempt to reform the Qing dynasty
